name: The Very Reluctant Pokemon Trainer (A For Victory! Nuzlocke Game)
name_original: The Very Reluctant Pokemon Trainer (A For Victory! Nuzlocke Game)
description:
This is what happens when someone who has never made a game before makes a game.

The Very Reluctant Pokemon Trainer is based off of my pokemon fan comic: For Victory! A Pokemon White Nuzlocke. I found the bitsy tool and thought it would be funny to make a """video game""" for the comic. If anything, this is entirely for me and no one else.
